plugins.name: CSV text replace
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Figma上のテキストレイヤーをCSVを使って効率的に一括置換・エクスポートできるツールです。

Figmaでのテキスト管理が多いプロジェクトや翻訳ワークフローに最適なプラグインです。


【主な機能】

①テキストの一括置換

CSVファイルにA列＝検索対象、B列＝置換内容を記述し、プラグインに読み込ませるだけで、Figma内の該当テキストを自動的に置き換えます。


②テキストのエクスポート

選択したフレームやテキストレイヤー内の文字列をCSV形式で書き出し。翻訳や編集作業との連携に最適です。


【使い方】

プラグイン起動後、

「リプレイス」タブでCSVファイルをアップロードし置換を実行

「エクスポート」タブでは、選択中のテキストをCSVでダウンロード可能

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----


This plugin allows you to bulk replace and export text layers in Figma using CSV files—perfect for efficient content updates and translation workflows.

Highly useful for localization, bulk edits, or working with external editors.


[Key Features]

①Bulk Replace Text

Simply upload a CSV file where column A = target text and column B = replacement text. The plugin will find and replace matching text layers in your Figma file.


②Export Text

Export text content from selected frames or layers into a CSV file. Ideal for translation or review processes.


[How to Use]

Open the plugin and go to the “Replace” tab to upload your CSV and execute replacement.

Use the “Export” tab to download the text from selected layers as a CSV file.

When a frame is selected, all text layers within that frame will be exported together as a CSV file.
plugins.tagline: Replace and export text layers in Figma via CSV. CSVでテキストを一括置換＆エクスポート。

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----

plugins.name: datify
plugins.description:
Quickly update or increment dates across selected frames or text layers. It's perfect for tables, planners, and any layout where dates need to be updated regularly.


  1. Set a start date and automatically increment dates within each frame or across multiple frames
  2. Auto-detect the existing date values across selected frames
  3. Retain the original date format or choose from a list of supported formats
  4. Skip hidden layers
  5. Choose whether to increment dates continuously across all selected frames or restart within each frame
  6. Set the increment to 0 to update all date values to the same date
  7. Enter a minus sign (–) before the number to decrement the dates instead.


📅 Supported date formats:

  1. MMM D (Jan 31)
  2. D MMM YYYY (31 Jan 2025)
  3. D MMMM YYYY (31 January 2025)
  4. MMMM D, YYYY (January 31, 2025)
  5. YYYY-MM-DD (2025-01-31)
  6. DD/MM/YYYY (31/01/2025)
  7. DD-MM-YYYY (31-01-2025)
  8. D/M/YYYY (5/6/2025)
  9. M/D/YY (1/31/25)
  10. YYYY/MM/DD (2025/01/31)
  11. MMMM YYYY (January 2025)
  12. D MMM YY (31 Jan 25)
  13. D.M.YYYY (31.01.2025)
  14. YYYY. M. D (2025. 1. 31)
plugins.tagline: A quick way to update and format dates in your designs

plugins.name: Wireframe Pilot
plugins.description:
Description

Wireframe Pilot is a Figma plugin that lets you create beautiful, professional low-fi landing page wireframes for a wide range of industries—instantly. Choose from free, hardcoded industry templates or use AI to generate custom content and color schemes tailored to your business. Perfect for designers, agencies, and business owners who want to jumpstart their web projects with best-practice layouts and content.


Key Features

* One-click wireframe generation for 12+ industries (landscaping, tech, law, etc.)

* AI-powered content and color palette generation (with the option to use your own OpenAI API key)

* Customizable sections, layouts, and color schemes

* No coding required—everything happens inside Figma


Instructions

1. Open the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Select your industry and customize sections, layouts, and colors as desired.

3. (Optional) Enter your OpenAI API key to unlock AI-powered content and color generation.

4. Click “Generate Wireframe” to add a complete landing page wireframe to your canvas.

5. Edit and iterate as needed!
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate modern, wireframes for landing pages within in Figma.

Key Features

* AI-powered content and color palette generation (with the option to use your own OpenAI API key)

* Customizable sections, layouts, and color schemes

Instructions

2. Select your industry and customize sections, layouts, and colors as desired.

3. (Optional) Enter your OpenAI API key to unlock AI-powered content and color generation.

4. Click “Generate Wireframe” to add a complete landing page wireframe to your canvas.

5. Edit and iterate as needed!

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs access to OpenAI's API for generating color schemes and content, Google Fonts for loading the Inter font family, and the custom backend for AI proxy.

136594.tagline: Instantly generate modern, wireframes for landing pages within in Figma.

plugins.name: Tokenize Your Design
plugins.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

133450.name: Tokenize Your Design
133450.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin may need to access resources from any domain for maximum flexibility during development and for future integrations.

133450.release_notes: In this version, the stroke colors will also be updated along with the fill color tokens.
133450.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

plugins.name: Ethos
plugins.description:
Ethos offers a top-notch brand asset management software solution and tools to streamline and organize your digital assets effortlessly.

- Create and share your own custom brand showrooms as an interactive website and pdf, and showcase and maintain your branding best practices.

- Share your official brand copy, brand logos, brand colors, brand fonts, brand rules and custom brand sections.

- Deploy your brand voice and image correctly to activate your powerful brand position.

- Improve your existing brand copy to bring it to the next level with artificial intelligence.

- Make your brand more authentic and cohesive by generating expanded primary, secondary and monotone color palettes.

- Invite your team and clients to your official brand spaces, and enable collaboration on one or more brands at a time.


For any questions or feedback, feel free to ping us at team@yourethos.io

accepted.name: Ethos
accepted.description: Build, share, and grow your iconic brand with our complete AI-powered creative brand showroom. Visit https://www.yourethos.io/ for more. Free Figma widget.

plugins.tagline: Brand Asset Management Software Solution

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

plugins.name: Background Manager
plugins.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
plugins.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

130561.name: Background Manager
130561.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
130561.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

plugins.name: Bulk Renamer
plugins.description:
Bulk Renamer 2.0


A powerful, user-friendly tool for renaming multiple frames or components in one go.


Bulk Renamer 2.0 lets you paste a list of names (typed manually, copied from Excel, or generated elsewhere) and instantly apply them to your selected frames — in the exact order and direction you choose.


⸻


✨ Features:

•Rename frames by typing or pasting names

•Smart support for Excel/Sheets cell pastes

•Auto-adds commas only when you press Enter

•Supports left-to-right or top-to-bottom frame direction

•Real-time validation for name count vs frame selection

•Clean, dark-themed UI with live feedback


⸻


🪄 How to use:

1.Select your frames/components in Figma

2.Choose your naming direction

3.Paste or type names (one per line)

4.Click Apply to rename all selected items
plugins.tagline: Rename multiple frames all at once.

136846.description:

plugins.name: Figma to osu!framework
plugins.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma elements into osu!framework snippets

129799.name: Figma to osu!framework
129799.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code

  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)
129799.tagline: Convert Figma elements into osu!framework snippets

plugins.name: prompt2canvas
plugins.description:
prompt2canvas brings powerful AI image generation directly into Figma. Use top models like Flux, SDXL, Imagen, and more—without leaving your design canvas.


Easily customize each model’s settings through a clean and intuitive interface, tailor prompts to your needs, and generate stunning visuals in seconds.


To use the plugin, you’ll need an API key from Replicate, which gives you access to a wide range of state-of-the-art AI models.
plugins.tagline: The power of top AI models, seamlessly integrated into your design workflow.

plugins.name: Fill Swap
plugins.description:
Fill Swap

Effortlessly swap in and out fills and remix your designs with randomized solid colors, gradients, images, and more — without moving or disrupting your layout. It’s the ultimate productivity hack for mood boards, prototypes, and rapid design exploration. Fast, fun, and non-destructive.


Try it for free, and see what clicks.
plugins.tagline: Randomly swap fills within a selection

133576.name: Fill Swap
133576.description:
Fill Swap

Effortlessly swap in and out fills and remix your designs with randomized solid colors, gradients, images, and more — without moving or disrupting your layout. It’s the ultimate productivity hack for mood boards, prototypes, and rapid design exploration. Fast, fun, and non-destructive.


Try it for free, and see what clicks.
133576.release_notes:
What’s New

- Improved performance for a smoother experience.

plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly

plugins.name: Halftone Converter
plugins.description:
This tool transforms any selected image into a customizable halftone effect, using individual ellipse layers to simulate tonal shading. You can control:


•Dot Size – Adjust the diameter of each dot to refine visual granularity

•Dot Density – Increase or decrease how many dots are used to represent the image


Once applied, the halftone output is placed in a Figma frame as editable ellipses, allowing for manual adjustment, recoloring, or animation. It’s ideal for designers looking to stylize artwork with a print-inspired, dot-matrix look.
plugins.tagline: Transform any image into editable halftone dots. Adjust size, density, and style directly in Figma.

137209.description:

Once applied, the halftone output is placed in a Figma frame as editable ellipses, allowing for manual adjustment, recoloring, or animation. It’s ideal for designers looking to stylize artwork with a print-inspired, dot-matrix look.
137209.tagline: Transform any image into editable halftone dots. Adjust size, density, and style directly in Figma.

plugins.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
plugins.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

plugins.name: Pixabay Illustrations
plugins.description:
Pixabay Illustrations Library is a powerful Figma plugin that brings you an extensive collection of high-quality illustrations directly from Pixabay. With thousands of unique designs at your fingertips, you can easily enhance your projects and inspire creativity. Whether you're working on web designs, presentations, or marketing materials, our library offers diverse styles to suit any theme.


Key Features:


Vast Collection: Access thousands of free illustrations in various styles and categories.

Easy Integration: Seamlessly add illustrations to your designs without leaving Figma.

Search Functionality: Quickly find the perfect illustration using keywords or categories.

High-Quality Graphics: All images are royalty-free and suitable for commercial use.

Transform your design workflow with the Pixabay Illustrations Library and watch your creativity soar!

plugins.name: RouteMyPath
plugins.description:
RouteMyPath is a Figma plugin designed for runners, designers, and creators who want to bring their workout journeys into their visual work.


Upload a .gpx file from your running app (e.g., Strava, Garmin, etc.) and RouteMyPath will:

•Parse your route data

•Visualize it as editable vector paths

•Enable custom layout and styling in Figma


Ideal for designing performance recaps, social sharing visuals, or creating unique journey-based content right inside your Figma canvas.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that turns your GPX route data into editable design elements

plugins.name: Real Data Filler
plugins.description:
Real Data Filler is a quick and smart plugin that populates your Figma text layers with realistic placeholder data — perfect for mockups, UI design, and prototypes.


Choose from a clean, tabbed interface with options like:


Names (full names, first/last)


Emails (realistic domains)


Cities (worldwide)


Phone Numbers


Custom Lists (coming soon)


Each selected text node gets a random data value of the type you select.


Use this to:


Populate wireframes with real-seeming names and emails


Fill mobile/table UI designs with user data


Quickly visualize form states and list views

plugins.name: Color Combo
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin enables direct testing of color combinations in your design file. This allows the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō to be integrated into modern digital design processes without intermediate steps.


Steps

  1. Open the Color Combo plugin
  2. Select two color styles from the dropdown (or add new ones)
  3. Apply these color styles to your design elements (frames, text, etc.)
  4. Choose a color combination: Click any combination preview, or hit Random for instant variety Toggle Muted colors for subtle palettes
plugins.tagline: Bringing the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō (1883–1967) to your digital workflow.

plugins.name: Designmate!
plugins.description:
Designmate! is your design thinking sidekick – built right into Figma.


Instead of vague scores or generic advice, Designmate! gives you concrete, context-aware feedback based on real user needs. Just drop in a screen, describe what the user is trying to do, and instantly get personalized suggestions to make your UI more usable, accessible, and delightful.


✨ What you’ll get:


  1. A clear explanation of what’s not working from a user’s perspective


  1. Specific UI/UX fixes, with exact actions to improve the screen


  1. Feedback on clarity, hierarchy, accessibility, copy, buttons, layout & more


  1. Zero BS, zero ego – just real product thinking in your Figma flow


Perfect for solo designers, founders, PMs, or teams looking to improve fast without overthinking it.
plugins.tagline: Your AI design critique buddy – smart UX/UI feedback in seconds.

plugins.name: GIF Boss
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions
plugins.tagline: Simultaneous multi GIF generation.

136516.name: GIF Boss
136516.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality

plugins.name: Iconize
plugins.description:
Transform any Figma design into a complete set of perfectly scaled Chrome extension icons in seconds.


Benefits:

  1. Save hours of manual work - No more tedious resizing and exporting
  2. Perfect proportions - Maintains design integrity across all sizes
  3. Professional results - Vector paths, text, and effects scale beautifully
  4. Chrome extension ready - Standard sizes (16px, 24px, 36px, 48px, 128px)
  5. Batch processing - Handle multiple designs simultaneously


How to use:

  1. Select your design - Choose any frame, group, component, or instance
  2. Run Iconize - Go to Plugins → Iconize → Scale to Icon Sizes
  3. Get your icons - Five perfectly scaled versions appear instantly
  4. Export to PNG / SVG and use - Icons are named icon16, icon24, icon36, icon48, icon128


Perfect for Chrome extensions, web apps, mobile apps, and any project requiring multiple icon sizes. Works with complex designs including vectors, text, effects, and nested elements.

accepted.name: George Valdes
accepted.description:
Post-architect
I like building, marketing, and selling outcomes

Iconize - Figma Plugin
Zenfiller - Auto Form filler
Zensets - Context engine

plugins.tagline: Instantly generate size appropriate icons at 16px, 24px, 36px, 48px & 128px from any design

plugins.name: Radix color palette
plugins.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

136337.name: Radix color palette
136337.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
136337.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

plugins.name: CSV to Table
plugins.description:
Convierte fácilmente archivos CSV en tablas dentro de Figma.


Con el plugin CSV to Table, importar datos a tus diseños nunca fue tan fácil. Simplemente selecciona tu archivo .csv y el plugin generará una tabla visual editable directamente en tu lienzo de Figma. Ideal para diseñadores de productos, equipos de UX/UI y presentaciones con datos reales.


🔹 Importa datos reales sin salir de Figma

🔹 Transforma automáticamente filas y columnas en capas de texto y formas

🔹 Personaliza estilos una vez importado

🔹 Sin necesidad de conexión a internet – tus datos permanecen seguros


Este recurso es completamente gratuito y no almacena tu información. Solo tú tienes acceso a los datos que importas.


---


Easily turn CSV files into tables inside Figma.


With the CSV to Table plugin, importing structured data into your designs is effortless. Just upload your .csv file, and this plugin will generate an editable table directly on your Figma canvas. Perfect for product designers, UX/UI teams, or anyone working with real data.


🔹 Import real data without leaving Figma

🔹 Automatically transforms rows and columns into styled text and shapes

🔹 Customize your table’s style after import

🔹 No internet connection needed – your data stays safe


This is a completely free community resource. Your data is never uploaded or stored externally.
plugins.tagline: Convierte CSV en tablas editables / Convert CSV files into editable Figma tables instantly.
